author: Kevin O'Sullivan
title: Covid-19: Virus-killing robot developed by TCD start-up
description: Akara Robotics device clinically proven to kill viruses and bacteria
content:
A robot emitting ultraviolet light (UVC) with the ability to disinfect hospitals and get rid of the Covid-19 virus has been developed by a start-up attached to Trinity College Dublin. 
Being able to clean healthcare facilities thoroughly and quickly is hugel… [+3382 chars]
